Class English

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.java.proj1.view.language.English
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LanguageImplementer

    public class English
extends java.lang.Object
implements LanguageImplementer
    Concrete class of the bridge implementer, stands for English language (ENG).

    1.0.0
    Author:
    MarczykLAP

      • showTestResults

        public void showTestResults(java.lang.String testedNumber,
                            java.lang.String testedOnValue,
                            boolean resultOfTest)
        Description copied from interface: LanguageImplementer
        Procedure prints information about recent Fermat's test with the results.
        Specified by:
        showTestResults in interface LanguageImplementer
        Parameters:
        testedNumber - The number which was tested ("p" in formula).
        testedOnValue - Value according to which the test was performed ("a" in formula).
        resultOfTest - Result in true-false whether the test was positive or not.
